channel.title: Falador massacre Final release
channel.description:
[COLOR="Red"][size=10pt]Falador pKiNg [/size] [/COLOR] [size=10pt]Yes im yamzermage 10 from ****locus[/size]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Server = [b]90% COMPLETE[/b]
Things that are incomplete ------------------------- *stronghold of security *zombie minigame
NOW features :DDDD -------------------- *377 cache, 474 mapdata *added music player with song- this fire burns - kill switch engage *working 100% lunars *100% ancients [b]*100% modern - EVEN SUPER HEATING!!!!!!!!!!![/b] *new santa dialouge - just outside by fally *100% castlewars - portal is ad edgeville *100%63 fight cave waves *100% fightcaves *dharok effect *guthan heals *all 24 skills work *some custom map areas - find them on ur own.. *consturction IS added..just find a way to turn it on and GL trying to fix the compile errors.. *GrandExchange - credits go to libun from silab. *no more damaged cache *pking is all outside falador castle - just need to make you're self a safezone *skill masters - now give skillcapes *pest control - with timer in boat, and thing that says when each portal has fallen, no homo NPC's *working on deleting some deltaorbs, added more portals, and some NPC's that tele you to certian places. *skillcape emotes - fishing emote will lock up you're client. *SANTA CLAUS = spawns AUTOMATICALLY on december 31st! *EASTER BUNNY = spawn AUTOMATICALLY on easter :) *home is obivsuly fally.. *Dragon claws 4x hit! *Dragon Anarchy minigame - thanks empirescape :)
[u][b][CUSTOM ITEMS][/b][/u] *Full statius - with warhammer special *Full vestas - with longsword, and spear, only longsword has special. *Full morrigans - with javelian special, along with throwing axe no spec *Full Zuriels - with special attack, it's like an earthquake around the player *Full Dragon'hai - with bonuses! *Full Corrupted dragon - with plateskirt and platelegs
[b][u]CREDITS(before it gets too late lol)[/u][/b] *NoobScape client = custom items *Delta_ = deltaorbs tutorial *Delta_ = source, and my IRL m8 -Capture The Dragon- fixing the anti-leech
==================================== some pictures - theirs more than what is listed ==================================== Dragon'hai robes [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/hai2.jpg[/img]
Vestas pvp armour [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Vestas.jpg[/img]
Zuriels pvp armour [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Zyruek.jpg[/img]
Morrigan pvp armour [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/morrigan.jpg[/img]
statius pvp armour [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/statius.jpg[/img]
Vengance spell :D! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/v3ng.jpg[/img]
full dragon amour + claws [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/warspear.jpg[/img]
100% pickpocket on NPC's [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/pickpocket.jpg[/img]
(again) 100% skill masters [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/skillmasters.jpg[/img]
Desert Eagle for zombie minigame [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/deagle.jpg[/img]
Attack skillcape emote [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/Fally1.jpg[/img]
This guy takes you to zombie minigame! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/supremecommander-1.jpg[/img]
Zombie Minigame [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/ZOIAM-1.jpg[/img]
Bandits [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/bandits.jpg[/img]
Working Magic tablets [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/combatfirst.jpg[/img]
duel Arena = Danger pk area :) portal by niles and giles [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/duelareapk.jpg[/img]
100% highscores! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/highscores-1.jpg[/img]
start you're adventure here, by thieving for cash! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/thieving-1.jpg[/img]
This guy teleports you to the stronghold place [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/bigdave.jpg[/img]
the guy above, takes you to stronghold level 1, talk to bob to get 10M, and go to level 2 of stronghold! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/level2.jpg[/img]
bob, takes you to stronghold level 2, talk to the ghost to get 20M, and go to the final level of stronghold! [IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/level3.jpg[/img]
*sorry forgot to take picture of 3rd level, it's a iron dragon, that drops 100M, fancy boots :S! ==================================================================== now for the final thing, the DOWNLOADS!!!
[b][b]*Credits go to megaupload ;)[/b][/b]
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9CIMR68P]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9CIMR68P[/url] Filename: Falador Massacre Client.rar File description: NoobScape/FaladorMassacre Client. File size: 29.5 MB
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=K3POEJNC]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=K3POEJNC[/url] Filename: Falador Massacre Source.rar File description: Falador MAssacre Source v1 File size: 35.72 MB
Have fun ;)! -Yamzer ------------------------------------------ [size=10pt][b][b][b][b]Please reply to get this source alive.[/b][/b][/b][/b][/size][/QUOTE]

item.title: Falador massacre Final release
item.dc:creator: @darkinfernal darkinfernal
item.description:
@darkinfernal wrote:

[COLOR=“Red”][size=10pt]Falador pKiNg [/size] [/COLOR]
[size=10pt]Yes im yamzermage 10 from ****locus[/size]

Server = 90% COMPLETE

Things that are incomplete

*stronghold of security
*zombie minigame

NOW features :DDDD

*377 cache, 474 mapdata
*added music player with song-
this fire burns - kill switch engage
*working 100% lunars
*100% ancients
*100% modern - EVEN SUPER HEATING!!!
*new santa dialouge - just outside by fally
*100% castlewars - portal is ad edgeville
*100%63 fight cave waves
*100% fightcaves
*dharok effect
*guthan heals
*all 24 skills work
*some custom map areas - find them on ur own…
*consturction IS added…just find a way to turn it on and GL trying to fix the compile errors…
*GrandExchange - credits go to libun from silab.
*no more damaged cache
*pking is all outside falador castle - just need to make you’re self a safezone
*skill masters - now give skillcapes
*pest control - with timer in boat, and thing that says when each portal has fallen, no homo NPC’s
*working on deleting some deltaorbs, added more portals, and some NPC’s that tele you to certian places.
*skillcape emotes - fishing emote will lock up you’re client.
*SANTA CLAUS = spawns AUTOMATICALLY on december 31st!
*EASTER BUNNY = spawn AUTOMATICALLY on easter
*home is obivsuly fally…
*Dragon claws 4x hit!
*Dragon Anarchy minigame - thanks empirescape

[CUSTOM ITEMS]
*Full statius - with warhammer special
*Full vestas - with longsword, and spear, only longsword has special.
*Full morrigans - with javelian special, along with throwing axe no spec
*Full Zuriels - with special attack, it’s like an earthquake around the player
*Full Dragon’hai - with bonuses!
*Full Corrupted dragon - with plateskirt and platelegs

CREDITS(before it gets too late lol)
*NoobScape client = custom items
*Delta_ = deltaorbs tutorial
*Delta_ = source, and my IRL m8 -Capture The Dragon- fixing the anti-leech

====================================
some pictures - theirs more than what is listed

Dragon’hai robes

Vestas pvp armour

statius pvp armour

Vengance spell :D!

full dragon amour + claws

100% pickpocket on NPC’s

(again) 100% skill masters

This guy takes you to zombie minigame!

Zombie Minigame

Bandits

Working Magic tablets

duel Arena = Danger pk area portal by niles and giles

100% highscores!

start you’re adventure here, by thieving for cash!

This guy teleports you to the stronghold place

the guy above, takes you to stronghold level 1, talk to bob to get 10M, and go to level 2 of stronghold!

bob, takes you to stronghold level 2, talk to the ghost to get 20M, and go to the final level of stronghold!

*sorry forgot to take picture of 3rd level, it’s a iron dragon, that drops 100M, fancy boots :S!

now for the final thing, the DOWNLOADS!!!
